name: Doctor Who Fan Made Adventure Game Demo
name_original: Doctor Who Fan Made Adventure Game Demo
description:
Doctor Who: A Space and Time Saga is a fan made gameplay demo inspired by the Doctor Who TV show and the classic point and click adventure game genre.

Play as the Tenth Doctor responding to a mysterious distress signal picked up by the TARDIS, leading them to as you explore a seemingly defunct Cybermen carrier craft  drifting through space.

This is an unofficial fan project and in no way associated with the official Doctor Who license or BBC studios.
